elements.text: The rect function draws an empty rectangle.

x0
  Top left x coordinate of rectangle.
y0
  Top left y coordinate of rectangle.
x1
  Bottom right x coordinate of rectangle.
y1
  Bottom right y coordinate of rectangle
col
  The color of the rectangle.

rectfill() behaves exactly the same as rect()
and takes the same arguments, except rectfill()
draws a filled-in rectangle.
